subject: Format for conveying the approval of Extension of Time in EPC Projects
text: HRr 7h TTTHTf %ferrrur 7419 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 M1 (em 4ar7 a {rTtNf #rq4) W44 / Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) i-5 & 6_ Qaer-10, ERMTT , 7 fcrit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Approval of EOT/2020 No. 9.2.33/2020 dated 26February, 2020 [Chairman'$ approval vide note dated 25.02.2020] Subject: Format for conveying the  approval of Extension of Time in EPC Projects: All ROs shall ensure that the letter of NHAI conveying the approval of EOT in EPC Projects shall be in the enclosed format for the cases recently cleared in last 2-3 months and also in future cases. A copy of the letter shall also be loaded on EOT Portal: 2 _ While sending the proposals on EOT to HQ, the draft letter conveying the approval of EOT shall invariably be furnished by ROs in the enclosed format: 3_ Technical Divisions at HQ shall also ensure the above instructions: Encl: Format 2 & (V.K. Sharma) CGM (Coord:) 1. All Officers of HQ/ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/Site Offices. ji. Hindi Officer for Translation in Hindi. iii. Library for hosting the circular in library site. MM M NhAL
